attributes.action: Influence abandonment of the offensively crass logo of the London Olympic Games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Logo for the London Olympic Games unveiled today will cause embarrassment  to all Right Minded Londoners and British citizens, who, right minded as they are, would not wish their city or country tarnished with the gross stupidity of paying Hundreds of Thousands of pounds for such a blatantly facile piece of mindless tat.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
